bug.short_desc: 1.6 RC1 package version is considered newer than 1.6 version from lazarus website
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): lazarus x86_64 1.6-0.2.RC1.fc24
How reproducible: If you install lazarus from the rpm the lazarus website (http://sourceforge.net/projects/lazarus/files/Lazarus%20Linux%20x86_64%20RPM/Lazarus%201.6/) dnf tries to replace it with the older release from the repos because it is considered newer.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Download and install lazarus from here (http://sourceforge.net/projects/lazarus/files/Lazarus%20Linux%20x86_64%20RPM/Lazarus%201.6/)
2. do an update
sudo dnf update Fedora 24 - x86_64 - Updates 531 kB/s | 17 MB 00:33 Last metadata expiration check: 0:00:25 ago on Thu Oct 20 00:28:39 2016. Dependencies resolved. ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Installing: lazarus x86_64 1.6-0.2.RC1.fc24 fedora 96 M ...
Possible solution: update lazarus to 1.6 in the repo

In principle updating the package does not solve the underlying problem that the Fedora packages have an higher number then the upstream packages. But that is mainly due to the invalid version-number of the upstream packages.
We can not solve that, though.
lazarus-1.6.2-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-96d9586d7a

lazarus-1.6.2-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-96d9586d7a
lazarus-1.6.2-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
lazarus-1.6.2-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-65d01e61eb
